author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

More prep work for the Run-3 GEM-CSC integrated local trigger. This goes together with PR cms-data/L1Trigger-CSCTriggerPrimitives#6. Follow-up of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33570
* Quality assignment functions were moved to `LCTQualityAssignment`
* GEMCSC LUT producer was updated to reflect cms-data/L1Trigger-CSCTriggerPrimitives#6
* LUT functions for physical ALCT-CLCT crossings were moved to `CSCALCTCrossCLCT`
* New procedures for Run-3 GEM-CSC trigger were added

**In the next PR** we will be updating the GEM-CSC matching procedures with 1/2-strip resolution and 1/8-strip resolution. The former is intended to be compatible with Run-2 EMTF. The latter would be compatible with Run-3 EMTF. The CSCUpgradeMotherboardLUT will be deleted (all luts in cms-data). CSCGEMMotherboardME11 and CSCGEMMotherboardME21 will be merged into CSCGEMMotherboard. CSCMotherboardME11 will be merged into CSCUpgradeMotherboard. This will be possible since we don't split up the LCT finding in ME1/a and ME1/b. Sorting and readout functions will be streamlined as well.

#### PR validation:

Tested with WF 11634.0. There shouldn't be any changes in WFs.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)

@tahuang1991
title: Prep work for the Run-3 GEM-CSC integrated local trigger (II)
